document_title.reason: Large top-left heading 'Invoice' visually prominent and matches schema 'document_title' synonyms.

invoice_number.reason: Found next to label 'Invoice #' inside the 'Invoice Details' block (visual grouping and strong label).

invoice_date.reason: Label 'Invoice date' followed by '08/01/2024' in the Invoice Details block; date normalized to ISO-8601.

due_date.reason: Label 'Due date' followed by '08/31/2024' in the Invoice Details block; normalized to ISO-8601.

terms.reason: Label 'Terms' with value 'Net 30' is present in the Invoice Details block next to invoice/date information.

currency.reason: Monetary values on the document use the dollar sign '$' (e.g., $125, $650.00); normalized to USD.

vendor.reason: Top-left block contains company name, address, phone, email and website grouped visually; fields extracted from that block.

vendor_name.reason: Prominent text at top-left; visually corresponds to vendor/company name.

vendor_address.reason: Address lines directly beneath vendor name in the top-left contact block (multi-line preserved).

vendor_phone.reason: Phone number shown in the vendor contact area (right of vendor name block); extracted as-is.

vendor_email.reason: Email shown in the vendor contact block; lowercased and trimmed for normalization.

vendor_website.reason: Website/domain string present in the vendor contact block; extracted as displayed.

customer.reason: Left-side pale-blue box labeled 'Bill To' contains the customer name and address grouped visually.

customer_name.reason: Text under the 'Bill To' heading; positioned and styled as the billed party name.

customer_address.reason: Address lines appear below the customer name within the 'Bill To' block; preserved as multi-line string.

customer_contact.reason: No explicit phone/email/contact line for the customer beyond the address in the 'Bill To' block.

line_items.reason: Two tabular rows under headers 'Product/Services | Qty/Hrs | Rate | Amount'. Extracted descriptions, quantities and monetary values from corresponding columns by column alignment and proximity.

item_description.reason: Schema field for a single item description is ambiguous when multiple line items exist; line_items array contains the extracted descriptions.

item_quantity.reason: Multiple quantities present in the line items table; values captured in 'line_items' array rather than a single field.

item_unit_price.reason: Multiple unit prices present; captured per-line in 'line_items' array. No single unit_price to populate here.

item_amount.reason: Multiple line amounts present; captured per-line in 'line_items' array rather than a single scalar field.

subtotal.reason: Label 'Subtotal' with value '$650.00' in the bottom-right summary area; normalized to numeric.

discount_amount.reason: Label 'Discount' followed by '-$65.00' in the summary; schema expects absolute/negative as shown so preserved and numeric normalized to -65.00.

discount_rate.reason: No percentage discount rate shown (only an absolute discount amount is displayed).

tax_rate.reason: Label 'Tax 8.5%' in the summary area indicates tax percentage; normalized to numeric percent 8.5.

tax_amount.reason: Numeric tax amount '$49.73' listed next to 'Tax 8.5%' in summary; normalized to numeric value.

total.reason: Bolded 'Total' value displayed as '$634.73' at bottom-right of the summary block; normalized to numeric.

balance_due.reason: No separate 'Balance Due' label or value present distinct from 'Total' on this document.

pay_to.reason: No 'Pay To' or bank/payment details block present on this invoice image.

bank_name.reason: No bank name visible on the document.

account_name.reason: No account name or transfer instructions provided on the invoice.

account_number.reason: No account number or routing details present on this document.

payment_instructions.reason: No free-text payment instructions or wiring notes on the invoice.

document_id.reason: No external filename or document id was provided with the input image.

extraction_confidence.reason: Aggregate confidence estimate for automated extraction based on clear typography and strong label cues across the document.
